#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int test;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
		char str[204];
		cin>>str;
		int len=strlen(str); 
		int cnt=0,i;
		for(i=4;i<(len-4);i++)
		{
			if(str[i]=='a'|| str[i]=='e' || str[i]=='i' || str[i]=='o'|| str[i]=='u')
			{
			   cnt++;	
			}
		}
		
		cout<<(len-4-cnt)<<"/"<<len<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
